attributes.action: Spread awareness of vapes within education
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to do this because there are too many young people that choose to vape because they are unaware of the dangers.
attributes.background: We want the government to make it mandatory and a law to teach the youth about the dangers of vapes within education.

rejection.details: The Relationships, Sex and Health Education statutory guidance sets out the curriculum topics and already states that in primary and secondary school, pupils should be taught the facts about legal and illegal harmful substances and associated risks. This includes smoking, alcohol use, and drug taking. To support schools to deliver this content effectively, the Department for Education published a suite of teacher training modules, including drugs, alcohol and tobacco, which makes specific reference to e-cigarettes. The RSHE statutory guidance is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/relationships-education-relationships-and-sex-education-rse-and-health-education
